name: Bomberman Online
summary: Bomberman Online is a multiplayer game for the Dreamcast. It adds ideas to the original formula with online play, playing fields, and other extras. Bomberman Online's servers were shut down in 2003. The game's multiplayer is restricted to offline only. The game was not published in Japan.
